sentences.en: A group of wealthy friends are cruising the sea near Sicily on a yacht.
sentences.cn: 一群有钱人开着游艇在西西里岛附近的海上游弋。

sentences.en: Barzini has friends in Sicily and they were beginning to sniff Michael's trail.
sentences.cn: 巴茨尼有些朋友在西西里,他们正在探听迈克尔的踪迹.

sentences.en: But we can't take too long. There are troubles in Sicily.
sentences.cn: 困难就在这里,但是,咱们不可耽搁太久.

sentences.en: Dust blows across the Mediterranean from North Africa and across Sicily to western Greece.
sentences.cn: 沙暴从北非地中海沿岸刮起、经西西里岛直奔希腊东岸.

sentences.en: Egypt, Sicily and Libya are your farms.
sentences.cn: 埃及 、 西西里、利比亚成为你的农场.

sentences.en: In Sicily the peasant does not live on the land he cultivates.
sentences.cn: 在西西里,农民一般都不单独住在自己耕种的土地上,因为这太危险.

sentences.en: In Sicily there was no surer road to death.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔冷冰冰他说,“眼下不去.

sentences.en: It was the kind of disfigurement common in Sicily because of the lack of medical care.
sentences.cn: 在西面里,因为医疗缺乏,所以畸形怪状的人比比皆是,小伤之所以下能愈合,就是因为付不起钱.

sentences.en: Sicily as his hometown and in his works occupy an important position.
sentences.cn: 西西里作为他的故乡,在他的创作中占据了重要位置.

sentences.en: Sicily has been the big story.
sentences.cn: 西西里才是轰动的新闻.

sentences.en: The film consists of four stories plus epilogue, set in 19 th - century Sicily.
sentences.cn: 这是一部寓言式的集锦片, 讲述了西西里地区的若干民间故事.

sentences.en: The German was moving to stiffen up the garrison in Sicily.
sentences.cn: 德军正在加强西西里守军之力量.

sentences.en: Then again for a piece on Sicily. "
sentences.cn: 后来再是去西西里去拍照. ”

sentences.en: Twenty minutes later he was on an Italian freighter slated for Sicily.
sentences.cn: 二十分钟之后,他登上了一艘开往西西里的意大利货轮.

sentences.en: Wine may outrank citrus as Sicily's most valuable product.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒的重要性可能超过柑橘而成为西西里最值钱的产品.
